statements: SELECT * FROM security_config;
SELECT security_id, user_id FROM security_config WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM security_config ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT security_id, user_id, device_id FROM security_config WHERE permission_granted = 'true';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM security_config WHERE device_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_config WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT security_id, access_level FROM security_config WHERE permission_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM security_config WHERE device_id = 10 AND access_level = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM security_config WHERE security_id > 100 ORDER BY security_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM security_config WHERE permission_granted = true;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT configuration_name, setting_value FROM security_configurations WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM access_policies WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY permission_type DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, permission_type FROM access_policies WHERE permission_type = 'read' AND device_id = 3;
SELECT id, configuration_name FROM security_configurations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY configuration_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_configurations FROM security_configurations GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT configuration_name, LENGTH(setting_value) AS value_length FROM security_configurations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY value_length DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, permission_type FROM access_policies WHERE permission_type LIKE 'read%' OR permission_type LIKE '%write' ORDER BY device_id, user_id DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, configuration_name, LEFT(setting_value, 20) AS truncated_value FROM security_configurations WHERE configuration_name LIKE '%admin%' AND setting_value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations;
SELECT id, security_level FROM security_configurations WHERE security_level='high';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_policies WHERE device_id=123;
SELECT id, device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE security_level = 'High';
SELECT device_id, security_key FROM security_configurations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM access_policies ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_type, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%Light%';
SELECT * FROM security_configurations ORDER BY security_level ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, encryption_key FROM security_configurations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE installation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT id, user_id, permission_level FROM access_policies WHERE permission_level >= 5 ORDER BY permission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT device_id, security_level FROM security_configurations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT * FROM access_policies WHERE permission_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations;
SELECT id, device_id, configuration_name FROM security_configurations ORDER BY configuration_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT id, policy_name FROM access_policies WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, device_id, timestamp FROM access_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations;
SELECT id, setting FROM security_configurations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT access_level, policy_name FROM access_policies WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type IN ('server', 'switch') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
